meanings.definition: Make (an action or process) easy or easier.
meanings.sent1: The teacher facilitated the learning by providing clear instructions.
meanings.sent2: The new software facilitated the data entry process.
meanings.sent3: The facilitator made the team-building exercise seem like a fun game.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude facilitated a smooth transition for the new employees.
meanings.sent5: The facilitation of the meeting was so efficient that everyone left feeling accomplished.

meanings.definition: Assist the progress of (a person or group)
meanings.sent1: The mentor facilitated the growth of the young entrepreneur.
meanings.sent2: The counselor facilitated the recovery of the support group members.
meanings.sent3: The facilitator helped the team reach their goal in record time.
meanings.sent4: His guidance facilitated her journey to self-discovery.
meanings.sent5: The facilitation of the project led to its successful completion ahead of schedule.
